亡.definition: to die; to lose; to be gone; to flee; deceased

亡命.definition: to flee; to go into exile (from prison)

亡國.definition: (of a nation) to be destroyed; to be subjugated; a fallen nation

亡國滅種.definition: country destroyed, its people annihilated (idiom); total destruction

亡國虜.definition: subjugated people; refugee from a destroyed country

亡羊補牢.definition: lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom); fig. to act belatedly; better late than never; to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted

亡魂.definition: soul of the deceased; departed spirit
